verses.roman:
kṛṣṇa-nāma loka-mukhe śuni' avirāma
sei loka 'vaiṣṇava' kaila anya saba grāma

synonyms: kṛṣṇa-nāma—the holy name of Lord Kṛṣṇa; loka-mukhe—from the mouth of those people; śuni'-hearing; avirāma—always; sei loka—those persons; vaiṣṇava—devotees; kaila—made; anya—other; saba—all; grāma—villages.
translation: Always hearing them chant the holy names of Lord Kṛṣṇa, the residents of all the other villages also became Vaiṣṇavas.
